name: Cool Ninja
description:
-- INSTRUCTIONS --

  • JUMP: Press SPACE
  • DASH: Press SPACE while jumping.

-- SYNOPSIS

An action game where you can only move with jump and dash! Sojiro is so Cool that he wont move using his feet, only in the air while killing his enemies.

If you see the YinYang it means that you can DASH through your enemy. Press SPACE!

If you fall or get touched by an enemy, Sojiro decides that has better things to do than just kill a bunch of enemies and just retires.

Thanks for playing my first game!
